docs.title: A framework for technical documentation
docs.text:
This is built with mkdocs. But a great place to start is Material for Docs

I built a python venv with python3 -m venv ~/python_venvs/mkdocs. Which is activated with source ~/python_venvs/mkdocs/bin/activate.1

docs.title: Latex math with MathJax
docs.text:
\[ \operatorname{ker} f=\{g\in G:f(g)=e_{H}\}{\mbox{.}} \]

The homomorphism \(f\) is injective if and only if its kernel is only the singleton set \(e_G\), because otherwise \(\exists a,b\in G\) with \(a\neq b\) such that \(f(a)=f(b)\).
